full: Merritt, Dustin, Evan L. MacLean, Sarah Jaffe, and Elizabeth M. Brannon. 2007. “A Comparative Analysis of Serial Ordering in Ring-Tailed Lemurs (Lemur Catta).” Journal of Comparative Psychology 121 (4): 363–71. doi:10.1037/0735-7036.121.4.363.
